title: CHILLING ADVENTURES OF SABRINA Season 3 Trailer Breakdown!
author: Think Story
comment: Praise satan! Only 8 days till the new season/part is here! Hope you'll consider subscribing as I'll be coming out with a full season video a day or two after it premieres. See you soon witches! 🧹🧹
Sabrina’s parents died in a plane crash at sea, right? Is it possible that the grave on the beach is related to them?
maybe the back door to hell is in dorians because in one of his paintings when he was hiding in the painting to help Ambrose after he killed the anti pope he said its literally hell in there

Every season looks better than the previous one!Like, this show is taking it on a brand new level!

Seeing the scene with Lucifer visiting Melvin and the other witch, only make some think that Sabrina visits them...
Glad I’m not the only one who got Midsommar vibes from the flower crown
description:
In this video we breakdown the official netflix trailer the Chilling Adventures of Sabrina season 3. Clues, easter eggs, and theories for what's in store this upcoming season!
